availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert W. Gregory (Hopkins County, Ky, farm laborer and medical student )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farm laborer and medical student. Tennessee native. Son of Richard Gregory and Sarah F. Gregory. Student in Union County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farm laborer in Hopkins County in 1860. Medical student in Hopkins County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, District 2, p. 515A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 752.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Hopkins County, KY, July 1863, p. 15.
"Robert W. Gregory (1840-1864)," Find A Grave, Memorial #67172704, accessed December 21, 2021, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/67172704.
